note: I am a caregiver in East Texas living a rather isolated life, so for now the fediverse is my window to humanity. If you want someone to chat with, feel free to reach out to me because I do enjoy spontaneous conversations. I love technology and making things by hand. I care deeply about humanity and the environment. I especially love learning about different cultures and cuisines, so I tend to follow accounts from all over the world that I come across just so I can learn more about people everywhere.
